Package com.kicas.rp.util

Class ReflectionHelper

java.lang.Object
com.kicas.rp.util.ReflectionHelper
public final class ReflectionHelper extends Object
Provides utilities to interact with Java classes and Java's reflection API. All methods return null upon failure rather than throwing exceptions. This class does not respect access modifiers.

    • isNullable

      public static boolean isNullable(Class<?> type)
      Return whether or not an object of the given type can be null.
      Parameters:
      type - the type.
      Returns:
      true if the given type can be null, false otherwise.

    • numericCast

      public static Number numericCast(Class<?> newType, Number target)
      Casts the given number to the new type.
      Parameters:
      newType - the new type.
      target - the number to cast.
      Returns:
      the casted number, or null if the new type is invalid.

    • safeCast

      public static <T> T safeCast(Class<T> newType, Object target)
      Safely casts the given object to the given type, and returning null if the cast could not be completed.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the new type.
      Parameters:
      newType - the new type.
      target - the target object.
      Returns:
      the casted object, or null if the cast could not be completed.
